other_tests.findings: Normal initially; repeated endoscopy showed villous atrophy and other findings consistent with collagenous enteritis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progressive findings led to the diagnosis of collagenous enteritis.

other_tests.findings: Diffusion-weighted imaging abnormality in the thalamus bilaterally consistent with Wernicke syndrome.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Clinical resolution of the coma and radiological remission of thalamus abnormalities after treatment.

other_tests.findings: Villous atrophy of the duodenum, villous atrophy and focal subepithelial fibrosis of the ileum, glandular atrophy, interstitial edema, and interstitial fibrosis of the colon, consistent with collagenous enteritis.
